abstract.p: Accor of France abandons talks to buy Granada Compass's hotel business because it is unable to agree on price; Granada Compass decides to hold auction for its Forte hotel division; Accor will not participate in auction (S)

block.p: Accor of France said it had abandoned talks to buy Granada Compass's hotel business because it was unable to agree on a price. Granada Compass, meanwhile, has decided to hold an auction for its Forte hotel division, which includes the Posthouse, Heritage and Signature chains. Accor said it would not participate in an auction, but potential bidders for the division, which could fetch around $5.8 billion, include Marriott International and the Hilton Group, analysts said.
